duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage sales geography to achieve revenue targets and maintain excellent clinical experience.
Interact directly with customers, hospital physicians, Catheter Laboratory personnel, and business office staff.
Provide clinical and case support, present technical in-services, and plan successful product evaluations.
Gather market intelligence on customer and competitive activity and communicate to sales and marketing leadership teams.
Support marketing-related trade shows and vendor/hospital fairs.
Ensure the highest level of product knowledge is attained and maintained.
Complete administrative reporting on a timely basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree,  3+ years direct experience in a hospital setting, experience and license as Cardiovascular Radiologic Technologist (CRT), Cardiovascular Technologist (CVT), or Registered Nurse (RN) or CVIS, RCIS
